Posts.Content: aber52 wrote: I went for a standard mammo friday. they started the test by taking  4 basic shots (not under compression) the tech said she would let the rad. review before they took the compression with implant displacement xrays, but after the rad. reviewed the tech came back in and took one more shot of my left breast (not under compression) and said that is all he needed. should i be concerned? i have had several Mamograms before and all were done with the compression & displacement views.  I feel like they stopped the procedure befor finishing. all information i read on mammos all include the compression why would they not do the compression? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Recent Mammogram procedure! aber52 GreenSeaTurtle
